title: Fraisier cake
description: An incredibly pretty French cake filled with delicious strawberries and crème pâtissière. Tricky to achieve but certain to impress.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz self-raising flour, plus extra for flouring
50g/1¾oz unsalted butter, melted and cooled slightly, plus extra for greasing
4 free-range eggs, plus 2 free-range egg yolks
150g/5½oz butter, cut into cubes and kept at room temperature
